Ifeoma Okoye (ma eleghị anya amụrụ na afọ nari iri itoolu iri atọ na asaa) bụ onye edemede Naijiria

Ndị na-akwado ya akpọwo ya "onye edemede nwanyị kachasị mkpa si Naịjirịa mgbe Flora Nwapa na Buchi Emecheta gasịrị," dị ka Oyekan Owomoyela si kwuo. A mụrụ ya na Anambra Steeti na Mpaghara owụwa anyanwu nke Naijiria. Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na St
Monica's College na Ogbunike iji nweta asambodo nkuzi na afọ nari iri itoolu iri ise na itoolu

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Nigeria na Nsukka iji nweta nzere Bachelor of Arts na Bekee na 1977. O dere akwụkwọ akụkọ gụnyere Behind the Clouds, akwụkwọ akụkọ ụmụaka na akụkọ mkpirikpi, dị ka The Village Boy na Eme Goes to School.
Ọ bụ ezie na a maara Okoye maka akụkọ dị mkpirikpi nke ụmụ ya, o dekwara akwụkwọ ụfọdụ maka ndị okenye, dị ka Behind the Clouds

Behind the Clouds bụ maka di na nwunye na-enweghị ụmụ, na otu ụta si ada n'ahụ nwanyị kama nwoke. Okoye natara ihe nrite maka ma Behind the Cloud na The Village Boy site na Naịjirịa National Council of Art and Culture na 1983, yana inweta ihe nrite akụkọ ifo kachasị mma nke afọ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Men Without Ears, na afọ nari iri itoolu iri asatọ na anọ.  N'afọ nari iri itoolu iri asatọ na ise, ọ natara onyinye ọzọ maka Daily Bread mgbe Eze gasịrị na Ife National Book Fair. Ọ bụkwa onye mmeri mpaghara Afrịka maka asọmpi akụkọ mkpirikpi nke Commonwealth na afọ nari iri itoolu iri itoolu na itoolu.
